description: This table stores the history of bundled payment distributions for the bundled episode.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BILL_DIST_HX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of the bundled payment distribution


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


System


User

columns.name: BILL_DIST_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the associated user who performed the bundled payment distribution

columns.name: BILL_DIST_HX_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant a user performed the bundled payment distribution
